A4.text: Peter Pan was first released in the United States on December 29, 1924.

A5.text: The film inspired Walt Disney to create his company's 1953 animated adaptation.

A6.text: Peter Pan premiered at Radio City Music Hall in New York City on February 5, 1953.

A7.text: The film also had a special limited re-release at the Philadelphia Film Festival in 2003.
